backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing user profiles, bookings, reviews, and access control with admin checks and public booking creation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across pages, components, hooks, and data modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and global utility application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and bootstrapping the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app defining routes, layout, and theme provider including the new public bookings route.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Authorization component that enforces login and admin role before rendering protected content with appropriate fallback screens.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and automatic query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with shop info, quick links, contact details, and a dynamic year plus a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Provides the site header with logo, navigation links, a call button, and a responsive mobile menu using a sheet drawer.
frontend/src/constants/shopInfo.ts: Exports static shop metadata including name, phone numbers, and address.
frontend/src/data/galleryItems.tsx: Defines a list of gallery items with titles, descriptions, icons, and optional details for repair services.
frontend/src/data/servicesCatalog.tsx: Provides categorized service definitions including IDs, descriptions, estimated times, and icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Checks whether the current caller is an admin using the actor and identity hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookings.ts: Exposes hooks for creating, retrieving, updating, and publicly accessing bookings through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePayments.ts: Defines a React Query hook that fetches all payment instructions from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReviews.ts: Implements hooks to fetch sorted reviews and submit new reviews, with cache invalidation on submit.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBookingsPage.tsx: Admin page to view, filter, and update booking statuses with UI components and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Booking form page that validates input, submits new bookings, and displays a confirmation screen.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays shop contact information, location, phone numbers, and business hours using styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery grid of images or icons with a detail dialog for viewing full descriptions. Uses GALLERY_ITEMS and supports item selection via modal.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Shows available payment methods and loads payment instructions from an API with skeleton loading states. Includes a styled header and method cards.
frontend/src/pages/PublicBookingsPage.ts: Fetches and displays public bookings with status indicators, loading/error states, and a dialog for viewing booking details. Supports selection of a booking by ID.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewsPage.tsx: Displays customer reviews and provides a form for submitting new reviews with validation and toast feedback. Shows star ratings and handles API submission.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Presents an accordion of service categories and their services from SERVICES_CATALOG. Includes a CTA card encouraging users to book a repair.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: React page rendering the shopâ€™s hero image, contact bar, and about section using SHOP_INFO data and UI components.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Provides helpers to format bigint nanosecond timestamps and convert date/time strings into nanoseconds.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support, including hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theming, colors, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, state version, and image update instructions.
